Text:
I downloaded this and skipped on the other duplicates because you upped a folder and not a zip file. 

I have no idea what motivates people to waste everybody's time archiving albums but thank you for having better sense than that.

awesome.
this doesn't have the annoying "this promo copy belongs to [obscure name]" audio watermark that the most popular discography torrent has.
Thanks for sharing, Paco! I also had a copy of a promo with overdubbed bullsh!t, now it's nice and clean!
